text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the morning light
Birds singing their sweet delight
Coffee brewing feels just right
Gonna conquer this new day bright

[Verse]
Windows open breeze comes through
Fresh and humble skies so blue
Smiles and laughter me and you
Everything feels so brand new

[Chorus]
Morning sun up in the sky
Chasing shadows waving bye
Dreams are never gonna die
With you by my side we'll fly

[Verse]
Steps we take on golden streets
In the rhythm of our heartbeats
Finding joy in small repeats
Every moment feels so sweet

[Bridge]
Rays of hope shining down
No more walking with a frown
In this love we'll never drown
Wearing happiness like a crown

[Chorus]
Morning sun up in the sky
Chasing shadows waving bye
Dreams are never gonna die
With you by my side we'll fly
title: Morning Sun
